name: Adventure Time for Kids
description:
Your kids will have a blast on this special tour designed especially for them! Let
me teach your children about Ottawa's rich history as Canada's capital while we
hit the road, and pass by all kinds of scenic attractions on our way to a fun
destination. Consider the following suggestions and let me know what your
children are interested in and I will take care of the rest. I can pack a
healthy lunch or we can pick something up at one of our stops.
